sourceDesc.p: Scan taken from materials at the Univeristy of Nebraska, Lincoln Special Archives

figure.figDesc: Scan of a pencil drawing. Man sits in a chair in front of a desk and what looks to be a barred window of some sort. He has a pencil in his hand, writing or drawing on a piece of paper. He also hold something is his mouth, probably a cigarette because of his hand placement and how there are the faint lines of smoke around his head. Most likely a self-portrait of Starkweather writing a letter or working on one of his drawings. Back of the scan is blank
